panels.content:
<div align="center">
<button onClick="send_command('SCHEDULE_FORCED_HOST_CHECK', host, livestatus_name)" style="color: black">Force Check</button>
<button onClick="send_command('ENABLE_HOST_NOTIFICATIONS', host, livestatus_name)" style="color: black">Enable Notification</button>
<button onClick="send_command('DISABLE_HOST_NOTIFICATIONS', host, livestatus_name)" style="color: black">Disable Notification</button>
<script type="text/javascript">
  var host = '$hostname';
  var datasource = '$grafana_ds';
  var livestatus_name = '$datasource';
  var service ='ping4';
function getURL() {
    source_url = window.location;
}
getURL();
function send_command(type, host, livestatus_name) {
  //Get the url datasource in grafana - Start
  var r = confirm("Do you want to send the '" + type + "' command to livestatus ?");
  if (r == true) {
    var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
    req.open("GET", "/grafana/api/datasources/name/" + datasource, false);
    req.send(null);
    console.log(req.status);
    if (req.status == "200") {
      var obj = JSON.parse(req.responseText);
      var url = "";
      url = source_url.protocol + "//" + source_url.host + "/grafana/send_request/api/v1/" + obj.name + "/command?type=" + encodeURIComponent(type) + "&host=" + encodeURIComponent(host) + "&service=" + encodeURIComponent(service) + "&livename=" + encodeURIComponent(livestatus_name);
      console.log(url);
      req.open("GET", url, true);
      req.addEventListener('load', function(){
        console.log(req.status);
        console.log(req.responseText);
        setTimeout(continueExecution, 1000);
      });
      req.send(null);
    }
    else {
      console.log("Error");
    }
  }
}
function continueExecution() {
  history.go(0);
}
</script>
panels.title: ACTIONS

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ping4" WHERE ("metric" = 'pl' AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ping4" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'pl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" =~ /Juniper Memory~/ AND "metric" = 'MEM_RE0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT last("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'MEM_FPC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "service" fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"

list.definition: SELECT hosts.display_name FROM ${datasource:csv} WHERE state ~ (${hoststate:pipe}) AND groups ~ (${hostgroup:pipe}) AND vars.device_type = ${device_type:pipe};

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES from hostalive  WITH KEY = "address" where device_type =~ /$device_type/  and hostname =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where  ($__to - $__from > "start") and ($__to - $__from <= "end")
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where  ($__to - $__from > "start") and ($__to - $__from <= "end")
